TopicTitle: requesting.... bigger VAB, SPH and launch pad please

Articles.Content:
this is just one small reason why...

Most people build small, einey, weiney, tiney little, short, small shuttles that require tweezers to play with them...

I like big...

Also... i have noticed that the physical size of the interior of the VAB is about half the dimensions of the exterior of the VAB building...

Bigger please...

EDIT:

The orange tanks are 3.75M and not the expected 2.5M ones in the stock game...

EDIT2:

This pix is a spoiler for future episodes of 'KSP: Life, Universe and Everything' that I'm working on...

I'm trying to work out if a shuttle, cargo drop plane or drop rocket will be best for lathe/duna/eve/jool deliveries...

Edited July 11, 2014 by Comwarrior

Ekhm... You =/= everyone.

also: your ship doesn't come close to some of the BS monsters I seen.

ergo: deal with it.
He's not alone though... I too like HUEGE
Good idea, but until it happens there's this

I'm trying that now...

ATM, i'm just building up the level of impressive ships in my new series so size isn't that big of an issue... but when i get to the point of sending a full habitation and life support station off to... the jool system... then a really seriously big rocket is going to be needed...
